metadata.description: Iron Man: Fast Friends brings insight into the bond between Tony 'Iron Man' Stark and James 'I'm in the Air Force' Rhodes, and why they're such good buddies. The Incredible Hulk: The Fury Files features S.H.I.E.L.D. director Nick Fury figuring out why it's a bad idea to make Bruce Banner angry.
metadata.name: Iron Man/Hulk/Fury
